entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
